1Man1Band's Links

Josh Payne is a One-Man-Band from Cedar Rapids, Iowa, and takes his years of performance experience from all genres to create a sound like no other. Imagine hearing multiple voices and instruments and seeing only one man on stage creating it all right before your eyes. Josh has performed on stages all over the world from big to small, creating music in any capacity he could. Josh co-produced his EP "Free" and has been involved in multiple stage musicals from Rent to Hairspray. With no formal training and years of trial and error, Josh has perfected the art of crowd pleasing through multiple facets of music and theatre.
